item.title: Mohan Nataraj
item.description:
Mohan Nataraj, a pure mathematician, theoretical computer scientist and software developer with 5 years of experience from silicon valley of India, Bangalore. I’m currently working in an early stage startup - designing and developing. I do lead myself with great confidence and believe in the following, 

 "It is by his activities and not by enjoyment that man feels he is alive.
 In idleness we not only feel that life is fleeting, but we also feel lifeless” 
                                                                     -Immanuel kant

My research interests include distribution in prime numbers, optimization, mathematical modeling, analysis and any programmable matter.

Two of my most fervent personal research project; I persevere on are Riemann hypothesis and computer aided drug development for CANCER.

  • Member of American Mathematical Society (Carleton University)[2019-2020]
  • Member of IEEE (Illinois Tech) [2012-present]
